source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_00<tab>Lue-Reeq seems rather surprised to see you standing before him.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_00<tab>Lue-Reeq a l'air toujours aussi sûr de lui.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_01<tab>The search for the Cardinal Virtue, Andreia, has begun, and Lue-Reeq's hirelings have already caught wind of news that may lead you to your prize more quickly than anticipated. Apparently, the fallen hunter was spotted in Amh Araeng, in the vicinity of Samiel's Backbone, and is said to be responsible for transforming a vicious spider into a rather more troublesome sin eater. Perhaps by pursuing this newborn you may ascertain the whereabouts of its creator...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_01<tab>D'après l'informatrice de Lue-Reeq, Andreia aurait été aperçue en Amh Araeng, où elle a transformé un monstre célèbre en purgateur. Allez retrouver votre partenaire à l'Échine du Simoun.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving in Amh Araeng, Lue-Reeq declares that it would be most effective if you were to split up and search separately for the spider-turned-eater. With luck, this will not take terribly long.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_02<tab>Lue-Reeq a décidé que vous auriez plus de chances de retrouver le scorpion transformé en purgateur par Andreia en vous séparant. Observez les environs à l'endroit indiqué, à la plaine d'Ambre, et abattez le monstre s'il se montre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_03<tab>A cursory search of your surroundings fails to turn up evidence of the spider's passing. However, there are still other parts of Amh Araeng where you may continue your hunt.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_03<tab>Vous n'avez pas trouvé le purgateur que vous cherchiez. Rendez-vous au nouvel endroit indiqué, toujours à la plaine d'Ambre, et observez les environs à nouveau. Tenez-vous <var 08 E905 ((prête)) ((prêt)) /var> au cas où le monstre vous attaquerait<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_04<tab>Sure enough, you eventually succeed in tracking down the spider and laying it low. Alas, there is still no sigh of Andreia. For now, all you can do is return to Samiel's Backbone and rendezvous with Lue-Reeq.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez vaincu le purgateur scorpion. Retournez au point de rendez-vous indiqué par Lue-Reeq et attendez le retour de votre partenaire.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_05<tab>Before you can speak with your partner in crime, you catch sight of the Virtue, and find yourself suddenly walking in her memories. Long, long ago, she had come to Amh Araeng with two others in their search for a notorious mark known as Balam<var 1F /var>Quitz. However, as they carried out their attack, the young Mystel was caught off guard by the beast's powerful roar, rendering her unable to come to the aid of her comrades, who were slain before her very eyes, for which she vowed to slay the fiend no matter what.

Although your sudden episode elicits Lue-Reeq's concern, you explain the nature of your gift and tell him of the memory you saw. Though the hunter is not entirely sure, he cannot shake the feeling that he has heard a similar tale before...but such discussions must wait until you have returned to the safety of the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_05<tab>Alors que vous attendiez Lue-Reeq, vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((tombée)) ((tombé)) /var> nez à nez avec Andreia<var 1D /var>! Vous avez alors eu une vision du passé, où Renda-Rae jurait de venger ses équipiers tombés au combat face à un coeurl redoutable... Allez rejoindre Lue-Reeq aux Marches nébuleuses pour fêter votre victoire du jour.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_06<tab>Lue-Reeq toasts your victory over the newborn sin eater and bids you eat and drink your fill in celebration. Though his tastes seem rather extravagant, he assures you that he has ample coin to pay for it, and rewards you for your continued service with a pittance.

※The next role quest will be available from Lue-Reeq upon reaching level 74 in any physical DPS class.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez porté un toast avant de vous régaler une fois de plus aux frais de Lue-Reeq, qui semble ravi de faire équipe avec vous. Il espère vous revoir lorsqu'il aura de nouvelles in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions sur Andreia, donc n'oubliez pas de lui rendre visite à nouveau.
* Lue-Reeq propose la prochaine quête aux jobs de DPS physiques de niveau 74.

TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Lue-Reeq in Amh Araeng.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Lue-Reeq, à l'Échine du Simoun

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_01<tab>Search for the spiderlike sin eater.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_01<tab>Observer les environs à l'endroit indiqué
 et abattre l'éventuel purgateur

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_02<tab>Search for the spiderlike sin eater.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_02<tab>Observer les environs au nouvel endroit
 indiqué et abattre l'éventuel purgateur

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_03<tab>Rendezvous with Lue-Reeq at Samiel's Backbone.
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Lue-Reeq in the Crystarium.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_04<tab>Parler à Lue-Reeq, aux Marches nébuleuses

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_000<tab>Wait...it's you! It's really you! You actually came─
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_000<tab>C'est toi<var 1D /var>! Tu es <var 08 E905 ((rrrevenue)) ((rrrevenu)) /var><var 1D /var>! J'étais pourtant sûr que...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_001<tab>I mean, uh... Never mind...

TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_002<tab>Ahem! You're here to hunt Andreia with me, yes? Of course you are! Why else would you be here? And wouldn't you know it, one of my hirelings should be returning with new information any moment now...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_002<tab>Ahem<var 1D /var>! Où en étions-nous<var 1D /var>? Andreia, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Tu tombes au bon moment, mon informatrice doit justement me rrrendre visite d'une minute à l'autre. Tiens, la voilà...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_HIREDWOMAN03273_000_003<tab>Greetings, milord. I am pleased to report that Andreia was recently sighted in Amh Araeng─in the vicinity of Samiel's Backbone, it would seem.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_HIREDWOMAN03273_000_003<tab>Je me suis renseignée, comme vous me l'avez demandé. La derrrnière apparition d'Andreia a été signalée en Amh Araeng, du côté de l'Échine du Simoun.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_HIREDWOMAN03273_000_004<tab>Apparently, there was a right vicious spider what was giving folks trouble, and now that it's been turned, it's about a dozen times worse. They'd be grateful for any assistance.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_HIREDWOMAN03273_000_004<tab>D'après mes in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions, elle s'est attaquée à un scorpion géant connu dans la région. Maintenant qu'il s'est trrransformé en purgateur, il fait encore plus de ravages qu'avant.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_005<tab>I see, I see! Well done, my friend. Your payment, as promised.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_005<tab>Intéressant... C'est du bon trrravail, voilà ta paye.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_006<tab>Why bother going out and about pestering the smallfolk for news when you can employ others to do it for you? The better to devote our precious time to rather more important matters, I say!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_006<tab>Pourquoi s'embêter à aller recueillir des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions quand on peut payer quelqu'un pour le faire à sa place<var 1D /var>? Notre temps est prrrécieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_007<tab>And owing to my winning strategy, we may now depart for Amh Araeng and the delightfully named Samiel's Backbone─for in pursuing the spider, we may yet find its maker!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_007<tab>Comme tu viens de l'entendre, nous allons nous frotter à un des monstres trrransformés par Andreia. En route pour l'Échine du Simoun, on a du scorpion à débusquer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_010<tab>This is certainly the place. I gather those bones once belonged to dear Samiel...but I see no troublesome arachnid.
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_010<tab>Voilà, c'est l'endrrroit en question. Le scorpion transformé en purgateur par Andreia devrait rôder par ici...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_011<tab>It being a rather large desert, I had considered hiring a few trackers to hasten our search, but I have yet to spy a place where such individuals might congregate. Pity...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_011<tab>Ce désert est si grand, c'est comme chercher une aiguille dans une meule de foin... J'engagerais bien quelqu'un pour faire le sale boulot à notre place, mais je crrrains qu'on manque de volontaires.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_012<tab>Bah! Nothing for it but to roll up our proverbial sleeves and do the dirty work ourselves! We shall split up and search the sands for this sin eater spider. Whoever finds it first may have the honor of slaying it themselves!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_012<tab>Tant pis, nous allons devoir dénicher ce purgateur à pinces nous-mêmes. Séparons-nous, et le prrremier qui tombe dessus lui met une raclée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_013<tab>And should we <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> find it, well...after we both have searched for...a suitable length of time, I say we meet back here. Let the hunt begin!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_013<tab>Et si on le trouve pas, on se rejoint ici, comprrris<var 1D /var>? Que la chasse commence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You survey the surrounding sands, but find no trace of the spider you seek...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Aucune trace d'un purgateur à pinces... Continuez vos recherches.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_050<tab>There she is. The scourge of Norvrandt, the devourer of souls─Balam<var 1F /var>Quitz!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_050<tab>Le voilà<var 1D /var>! Le fauve le plus terrible d'Amh Araeng, le dévorrreur d'âme, B'alam Quitze<var 1D /var>! Nous allons le faire payer pour ses méfaits<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_100_050<tab>We bring this mark down, they'll be singing ballads about us till the end of time─never mind the king's bounty! Hells, we could buy ourselves a couple of castles apiece...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_100_050<tab>Nous ramènerons sa tête, et nos noms serrront connus dans tout Norvrandt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_051<tab>Flanking maneuver, as discussed. Wait for my signal, then we'll strike as one!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_051<tab>Vous deux<var 1D /var>! En position sur les flancs, attendez mon signal<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_BARDOFELF_000_052<tab>Dammit! She's onto us!
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_BARDOFHYUM_100_052<tab>Don't panic, we planned for this! We'll act as decoys while Renda-Rae brings her down. Go, go!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_BARDOFHYUM_100_052<tab>On va jouer les appâts<var 1D /var>! Renda, tu nous couvres<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_053<tab>Wait, not yet! There's no need to rush this!
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_100_053<tab>Sod it. Always so headstrong...
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_054<tab>Bugger me, my head... I can't...
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_055<tab>No... No! Come back here! Finish it, you bloody bastard! Finish me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_055<tab>Non... Non<var 1D /var>! Rrreviens, on n'en a pas fini<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_056<tab>I'm so sorry. It's all my fault...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_056<tab>Je suis tellement désolée. Tout est de ma faute...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_057<tab>I'll not let it end like this. I promise. I'll kill that godsdamned beast if it's the last thing I do...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_RENDARAE_000_057<tab>Je ne peux pas en rester là. Je tuerrrai cette bête un jour, je le jure...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_058<tab>Hey, hey! What was that just now? I've had headaches before, but the way you were thrashing about wasn't like anything I've ever felt...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_058<tab>Hé, ça va<var 1D /var>!? Tu avais l'air d'avoir une sacrrrée migraine...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_059<tab>By the gods! And I thought we were lucky just to catch a glimpse of Andreia─but you're also telling me you were granted a vision of her past with this power of yours?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_059<tab>Vrrraiment<var 1D /var>!? J'en revenais pas d'avoir trouvé Andreia si vite, et maintenant tu me dis que tu viens en plus d'avoir une vision de son passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_060<tab>Though...hmm. Two warriors killed while hunting a great horned beast─a beast their surviving companion vows to slay in revenge. I have heard this tale before, I know it...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_060<tab>Une archère vaincue par un fauve redoutable et qui jurrre de venger la mort de ses deux compagnons. J'ai l'impression d'avoir déjà entendu ça quelque part...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_061<tab>Bah, it is a common enough sort of tale, I suppose. And regardless, she is gone. Come─let us return to the Crystarium and celebrate your accomplishment!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_061<tab>Bah, sûrement une histoire folklorique comme une autre. Puisque tu as tué notre purrrgateur scorpion, retournons à la taverne pour fêter ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_070<tab>The table is set! And so I bid you raise a glass with me, that together we might toast your spectacular accomplishment!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_070<tab>À table<var 1D /var>! Fais-toi plaisirrr, et bois jusqu'à plus soif<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_100_070<tab><grunt> <crunch> <crunch>
<snort> <slurp> <grunt>
There's really nothing quite like a hearty meal after a job well done. Drink up, my friend, drink up! <belch>
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_100_070<tab>Alors, quel goût a le vin de la victoire<var 1D /var>? (boit) Succulent, non<var 1D /var>? (boit) Buvons, et buvons encorrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_100_071<tab>Had your fill? I've another few bottles ready and waiting to be opened. No? Oh, very well, if you insist...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_100_071<tab>Tu en as assez<var 1D /var>!? On peut ouvrir autant de bouteilles qu'il te plairrra, tu sais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_071<tab>...It occurs to me, my good <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, that I have yet to ask you your name. So quickly did we forge our friendship that I hardly noticed until now!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_071<tab>Au fait, <var 08 E905 ((ma bonne amie)) ((mon bon ami)) /var>, je viens de rrréaliser que je t'ai toujours pas demandé ton nom<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_072<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>... Reeq and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Yes, I rather like the sound of that. Reeq and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the daring duo! The brave bounty hunters, the scourge of sin eaters!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_072<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>... Reeq et <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Ouais, je trrrouve que ça sonne bien<var 1D /var>! On va faire un duo du tonnerre, tu vas voir.

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_073<tab>Once we have slain Andreia, not a soul in Norvrandt will not know our names. They shall ring out all across the realm!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_073<tab>J'entends déjà les gens chanter nos noms à trrravers Norvrandt, quand on aura ramené la tête d'Andreia<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_074<tab>Ah, but I should dwell overmuch on the victory before the struggle. A wise hunter is prepared and patient. 'Twould be prudent to send double, nay triple the agents afield to seek out promising new leads...
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_074<tab>Mais il faut pas vendre la peau du purgateur avant de l'avoir tué. Pour pouvoir défier Andreia, nous avons encore beaucoup de trrravail devant nous. En attendant, voici ta récompense, tu l'as bien méritée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_A2_000_001<tab>If I didn't know any better, I'd say you're a gillionaire.
TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_A2_000_002<tab>You sure it's wise to spend your money so freely?
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_A2_000_002<tab>Il faut arrêter de jeter l'argent par les fenêtres...

source: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_075<tab>Worried about the budget for our brave endeavor? Well, don't be. I am prepared to fund our activities as needed─no expense shall be spared! None whatsoever!
target: TEXT_LUCKBA311_03274_LUEREEQ_000_075<tab>T'inquiète pas pour ça<var 1D /var>! Tout ce qui imporrrte, c'est d'accomplir notre mission. Surtout, me fais pas faux bond<var 1D /var>! Aie confiance et tout ira bien.
